select count(*) from anafor_user where user_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into anafor_user (user_id, user_name, user_birth, user_tel, user_gender, ${social_type} ) values(#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_birth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{user_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_gender}, #{social_id})
mapper.update: update anafor_user set user_name = #{user_name}, user_tel = #{user_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_gender = #{user_gender} where ${social_type} = #{social_id}
